subject: Re: Categories in JUnit 4.8
msgSnippet: Sorry! The URL is http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/#issue/37 (can the issue number change? I have memories of this being number 41). The title is:
messageBody:
Sorry!

The URL is http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/#issue/37 (can the issue number change? I have memories of this being number 41). The title is: Feature request: Making test suites less tedious.

On a side note: this does not allow for direct inheritance like in the categories, but for a combination of tests and suites, which, IMHO, achieves the same flexibility.

Cheers,
Georg
